__TOC__

Welcome to your new Ubuntu Linux desktop.  At the very top of your screen you will see a bar that runs horizontally.  This bar is called a panel. 
 
[image of panel]

On this panel you see three words to the left: Applications Places System.  Click on Applications.

[image of applications dropdown menu]

Here you see the dropdown menu shown above.  This is where you will find most of your programs.
